attributes.action: Provide better safety for the residents of Oakbank New Addington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Oakbank & Fieldway area of New Addington has seen crime and abuse rise rapidly recently. 
The main problems are gang related. 
With youths ranging from 9 to 18 yr olds roaming the streets after dark causing havoc. 
Cars are being smashed into, homes are being targeted with eggs and stones. 
Verbal abuse is shouted daily to residents. 
The lighting in the area is sparse and dull. There are no CCTV's to record any evidence. 
Police patrols are sparse. 
We need better street lighting, CCTV cameras and more police patrols. 
We do not feel safe in our own homes at the moment which is every citizens right to do so.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
